医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗接种引发的抗体可能取决于之前的感染史研究人员评估了对基于 mRNA 和载体的 COVID-19 疫苗以及天然 SARS-CoV-2 感染的不同免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Study-suggests-antibodies-triggered-by-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccination-may-depend-on-prior-infection-history.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Study-suggests-antibodies-triggered-by-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccination-may-depend-on-prior-infection-history.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=606deb37-06f8-4f25-a8e1-5d6ddbf3b202 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 04:10:00 -0400 Study suggests antibodies triggered by COVID-19 mRNA vaccination may depend on prior infection history
基于相互作用组学的分析表明，鼻炎和鼻炎伴哮喘在机制上是不同的疾病研究人员利用人类转录组数据来区分与两种过敏性鼻炎表型相关的分子机制：鼻炎和哮喘鼻炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Interactomics-based-analysis-suggests-that-rhinitis-and-rhinitis-with-asthma-are-mechanistically- Different-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Interactomics-based-analysis-suggests-that-rhinitis-and-rhinitis-with-asthma-are-mechanistically- Different-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57be4966-59f3-4231-927b-d79edd9c1afc Thu, 17 Aug 2023 04:07:00 -0400 Interactomics-based analysis suggests that rhinitis and rhinitis with asthma are mechanistically different diseases
机器学习算法能否识别有延迟开始癌症治疗风险的患者？多级机器学习模型，用于估计大量癌症患者的癌症诊断和治疗开始之间的延迟风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Can-machine-learning-algorithms-identify-病人-at-risk-of-a-delay-in-starting-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Can-machine-learning-algorithms-identify-病人-at-risk-of-a-delay-in-starting-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca57ffc7-e639-4121-aeab-284d745450e1 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 04:05:00 -0400 Can machine learning algorithms identify patients at risk of a delay in starting cancer treatment?
照顾者抑郁会影响帕金森病患者的预后吗？研究人员评估了患有抑郁症状的护理人员与帕金森病患者的生活质量、住院情况和急诊科会诊之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Does-depression-in-caregivers-affect-the-prognosis-of-Parkinsone28099s-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Does-depression-in-caregivers-affect-the-prognosis-of-Parkinsone28099s-disease-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bf0ea65-8db6-4ec9-b792-5305f04b9f1d Thu, 17 Aug 2023 04:04:00 -0400 Does depression in caregivers affect the prognosis of Parkinson’s disease patients?
COVID-19 恢复期血浆未来用于对抗严重 SARS-CoV-2 炎症的单克隆抗体的潜力研究人员报告说，恢复期血浆治疗对于治疗住院的 COVID-19 患者最有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Potential-of-COVID-19-convalescent-plasma-for-future-monoclonal-antibodies-against-severe-SARS-CoV-2-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Potential-of-COVID-19-convalescent-plasma-for-future-monoclonal-antibodies-against-severe-SARS-CoV-2-inflammation.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aeee1847-645b-42f4-a4a4-ef8c37582c8a Thu, 17 Aug 2023 03:58:00 -0400 Potential of COVID-19 convalescent plasma for future monoclonal antibodies against severe SARS-CoV-2 inflammation
长期使用质子泵抑制剂与痴呆风险增加相关研究人员确定当前和累积使用处方质子泵抑制剂是否会增加患痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Long-term-use-of-质子泵-抑制剂-关联-with-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Long-term-use-of-质子泵-抑制剂-关联-with-increased-risk-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e94ed049-c84b-4717-a665-8d4fb978d513 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 03:42:00 -0400 Long-term use of proton pump inhibitors associated with increased risk of dementia
初级保健中护士提供的简短睡眠限制疗法对于失眠症临床有效、安全且可能具有成本效益研究人员比较了护士提供的睡眠限制疗法与睡眠卫生疗法对失眠治疗的成本效益和临床影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Brief-nurse-delivered-sleep-restriction-therapy-in-primary-care-is-clinically- effective-for-insomnia-disorder-safe-and-可能具有成本效益.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Brief-nurse-delivered-sleep-restriction-therapy-in-primary-care-is-clinically- effective-for-insomnia-disorder-safe-and-可能具有成本效益.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73072be6-f605-48a7-88ec-75aa71896456 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 03:28:00 -0400 Brief nurse-delivered sleep restriction therapy in primary care is clinically effective for insomnia disorder, safe, and likely to be cost-effective
STING 基因变异与严重 A 组链球菌感染的风险增加有关A 组链球菌是相当常见的细菌，可引起链球菌性咽喉炎或脓疱疮等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/STING-gene-variant-linked-to-increased-risk-of-severe-group-A-strep-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/STING-gene-variant-linked-to-increased-risk-of-severe-group-A-strep-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db37eb9f-3720-4c0f-b186-328dbee4ad03 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 02:26:39 -0400 STING gene variant linked to increased risk of severe group A strep infections
外螺纹低温样品储存管Ziath 报告了其 2 ml CryzoTraq™ 2-ECT 存储管如何通过最大限度地减少交叉污染的机会来保持样品的高度完整性，因为其外螺纹设计消除了样品遇到螺纹的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Externally-threaded-cryogenic-sample-storage-tubes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Externally-threaded-cryogenic-sample-storage-tubes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cd6dc8b-6fa0-4ac0-8610-83e26276d2c8 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 01:06:00 -0400 Externally threaded cryogenic sample storage tubes
先前接种疫苗可能有助于预防阿尔茨海默病事先接种过破伤风和白喉疫苗，无论是否患有百日咳（Tdap/Td）；带状疱疹（HZ），俗称带状疱疹；根据休斯敦大学健康中心的最新研究，肺炎球菌和肺炎球菌都与降低患阿尔茨海默病的风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Prior-vaccinations-may-help-protect-against-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Prior-vaccinations-may-help-protect-against-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58cbafc1-cacb-4fb1-a9b4-9db3b78a9232 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 23:16:00 -0400 Prior vaccinations may help protect against Alzheimer's disease
